string.text: artifacts,trading,friendly
Hey %other_first_name%, you still looking for that Soul artifact?
Damn right I am! You actually found one?
Maybe. Depends on what you're offering. This thing wasn't easy to get.
How about 25k rubles and that Vintar BC you wanted?
Alright Ill take it! Meet me at %location%, same spot as last time.
mutants,danger,urgent
%other_last_name%! Don't go to the old warehouse! Bloodsucker nest!
Shit! How many did you see, %other_first_name%?
At least three. Maybe more. Lost Ivan and Petrov already.
Thanks for the warning, brother. I'll try to spread the word.
faction,tension,rivalry
You %other_faction% mice were sniffing around our territory again.
Your territory? no one gives a fuck what you say. You guys are a joke
You are not going to like our punchline
COME ON THEN! We are ready.
You %other_faction% vermin better watch out.
All talk as usual.
faction,tension,rivalry
You %other_faction% lot were bleeding into our sector again.
How about you shut the fuck up, you can't enforce shit.
You'll be the first, %speaker1_last_name%
faction,tension,rivalry
YO %other_faction% mouth-breathers, we've disabled all your traps by %location%. Fucking idiots
How can you possibly know you got them all or even a fraction of them.
Alright listen I'm not gonna have a logical debate with you about the philosophies of trap disarment and survivorship bias.
Hope your gear’s as good as your words.
faction,tension,rivalry
We saw you %other_faction% boys skulking around near %location%. Looking for another beating?
We go where we want. You don’t own shit but a pile of corpses.
Say that again when you're not hiding behind anomaly fog.
You're welcome to step into the fog, we’ll light it up for you.
More empty threats by %other_faction% punks
faction,tension,rivalry
God damn it! %other_faction% scum were looting our dead again.
Your dead aren't using the gear. Consider recycling and changing channels idiot
artifacts,trading,friendly
%other_first_name%, heard you got your hands on a Moonlight artifact.
Maybe I do. Depends on the going price for one.
15k rubles and this modified VSS. Fair trade?
Ehh, make it 20k and you got a deal. This thing wasn't easy to get.
Alright, 20k it is. Meet me %location% in an hourish.
friendly,warning,story
%other_last_name%! Unknown convoy heading your way, about half a dozen strong!
Shit! How far out are they, %speaker1_first_name%?
Maybe 15 minutes. They seemed armed heavy, hurry the fuck up.
Thanks for the heads up. I'm bugging out now!
equipment,help,friendly
%other_first_name% brat, my rifle's jamming every few shots. You know anything about gunsmithing?
Let me guess - AK-74? Those things clog up fast in this radioactive mud.
Nahh you're bullshitting. AK's are built for the mud, are you crazy?
Brat, no offense but you don't know what you're talking about.
You know what, not gonna argue with you brat! I'm heading back to our hideout, I'll leave the AK on ur bench
faction,tension,rivalry
You %other_faction% bastards think you own this whole area!
We earned our territory. Unlike you %speaker1_faction% cowards.
Only thing you've earned is my balls on your chin, sit down.
xD aight thats pretty funny, you're still a bitch tho.
mutants,hunting,cooperation
%other_first_name%, want to team up for that Chimera bounty?
Hell yes! That thing nearly killed a buddy of mine last week. What's the plan?
I'll bait it into an open area, you hit it with the auto shotty from the bushes. I'll cover you with the SVD
Risky, but it might work. Split the bounty 40-60 since I'm taking the bigger risk.
Fair enough. Let's gear up and move out.
emergency,rescue,urgent
MAYDAY! %other_first_name%, I'm pinned down by snorks %location%!
Hold tight %speaker1_last_name%! How many are there?
At least five, maybe more! Running low on ammo!
I'm 5 minutes out with grenades. Try to fall back to cover!
information,trading,friendly
%other_first_name%, I got intel on a fresh artifact spawn. Interested?
Depends on the price and location. What kind of artifact?
Flash artifact, high-grade. 5k for the coordinates.
That's steep. How about 3k and I'll owe you a favor?
Deal. Swap to private channel.
supplies,problems,friendly
%other_first_name%, the supply convoy got hit by an enemy raid. We're running low on everything.
Damn it! How long can we hold out with current supplies?
Maybe a couple weeks if we ration carefully. Need to find another supplier.
I know a guy who might help, but he's expensive. Worth a shot though.
anomaly,danger,warning
%other_first_name%, stay away from the old factory. New anomaly field appeared overnight.
What kind of anomaly? Gravitational? Electrical?
Something I've never seen before. Turns metal to glass, organic matter to stone.
Fuck... thanks for the warning. I was planning to scavenge there today.
Yeah, definitely avoid it. Lost a good detector testing the edge of that field.
stash,discovery,greed
%other_first_name%, someone stole half of my stash. Did you hear anything about it?
Damn, nah haven't heard anything brat.
Someone does. If I catch them...
Might be those rookies that came through yesterday.
Rookies, huh? I'll find those fuckers.
Let me know if you need help.
faction,tension,rivalry
Listen up %other_faction% people. We're proposing a ceasefire near %location%.
A ceasefire? Since when do %speaker1_faction% care about peace?
Since we're all losing good men to the recent large mutant migration in the area.
...I'll run it by command. No promises.
medical,emergency,urgent
%other_first_name%! Need a medic ASAP! Glukovsky's bleeding bad!
What happened? Where are you?
Boar attack near %location%. Tore through his armor like paper!
Apply pressure to the wound! I'm sending a squad your way!
Hurry the fuck up! I can't stop this fucking bleed.
advice,emission,experienced
Sky went blood red near Rostok. Got caught halfway to Garbage. Barely made it.
That glow's your five-minute warning. Drop whatever you're doing and dig in.
Any safe spots left around there? Bar's too far when you're deep in the wilds.
There's an old checkpoint north of the scrapyard, half-buried. Roof's still solid last I checked.
Noted. Still owe vodka to the guy who dragged me into cover last time. Saved my ass.
faction,betrayal,anger
You %other_faction% snakes broke the truce at %location%!
Wasn't us.
Bullshit! They had %other_faction% patches!
Could be renegades wearing our colors. Think about it!
I'll get to the fucking end of this, dont worry.
I'm not worried.
mutants,controller,horror
Brat... something's wrong... hearing voices...
Shit! Controller nearby! Look at your feet, don't look up!
Can't... resist... it's calling me...
SNAP OUT OF IT BRAT!
trading,illegal,suspicious
%other_first_name%, I can get you that experimental rifle you wanted.
The Gauss rifle? I thought those were military only.
Let's just say I know a guy who knows a guy with a stash. 150k rubles.
That's... actually reasonable. Send me the info?
Done, check your private channel.
mystery,zone,investigation
%other_first_name%, you heard about the stalkers disappearing near the Brain Scorcher?
Yeah, but people always disappear there. What's different?
Their bodies show up days later, miles away, perfectly preserved.
That's... not normal, even for the Zone.
All these years and we're still clueless to the inner workings of the zone.
humor,drunk,friendly
%other_first_name%! My bset friend! Hve I told you...youre my fucking brat!?
Jesus, how much vodka did you drink?
Not enouhg! The Zone... shes singing to me! Come! JOIN
Alright buddy, time to sleep it off before you wander into an anomaly.
faction,territory,negotiation
This is %speaker1_faction% territory now. Pack your shit and leave.
Now I know you're not talking to us.
Watch us. You have 24 hours.
Nah. Good luck!
Gather the men Sergei
science,mutants,research
%other_first_name%, the nerds want a live bloodsucker for research.
A LIVE bloodsucker? Are they insane?
They're paying 200k for it. Still think they're insane?
...Alright, I'm listening. How the hell do we trap one?
Swap to private channel.
rescue,lost,urgent
SPARTAN squad hasn't reported in. They were up in Red Forest.
How long have they been dark? And what the fuck are they doing in Red Forest?
Six hours. Way past their check-in time, Above my paygrade to know.
Why wasn't I told about this, FUCK. Gather the recruits, I'll be there soon!
Roger.
supplies,food,problem
%other_first_name%, our stash is looking very lacking.
Cyka. How did the hunting go?
No fucking luck.
We'll plan out a loot run for tomorrow when I get back, almost done with the deal.
artifacts,danger,warning
DON'T TOUCH THAT ARTIFACT! %other_first_name%, step back NOW!
What? Why? It's just glowing a bit...
BLYAT BACK AWAY!
Backing away slowly...
You don't want to know what i saw through the scope. Regroup.
story,campfire,horror
Anyone else hear about that stalker who got stuck in a time loop near Yantar?
Bullshit story. Time doesn't work like that, even in the Zone.
No man, I met him. Guy aged 10 years in what felt like a day to us. Eyes were all fucked up, kept muttering about "the loop closing"
...shit. Maybe I'll avoid Yantar for a while.
advice,veteran,wisdom
Listen up rookies. If you see grass growing in perfect circles, turn the fuck around.
Why? What's with the grass circles?
That's where the Zone breathes... Reality gets thin there. Many tales of parts of lost stalkers found around them.
Parts?
Parts of them came back. Different times, different places. Trust me, avoid the circles.
story,survival,close_call
Holy fuck boys, I just had the closest call of my life.
What happened %speaker1_first_name%? You sound shook.
Pseudogiant chased me into a whirligig field. Had to dodge between the anomalies while that thing charged through them.
No fucking way you survived that.
The whirligigs tore it apart. I'm covered in mutant chunks but alive. Need vodka. Lots of vodka.
artifacts,danger,story
Remember that Kolobok I was tracking? Found it.
Nice! That's worth at least 40k!
Yeah, about that... it was bait. Fucking bandits had set up the whole thing.
Shit, they get you?
Nah, but i had to leave my detector and most of my ammo behind...fuck, living off tourist's delight for a week now.
mystery,zone,phenomenon
Guys, I just saw something that shouldn't exist.
In the Zone? That's basically Tuesday bro.
No, I mean it. A fucking door. Just standing in the middle of a field, no walls, nothing. And it was open.
Did you... look through it?
I saw myself on the other side. But older. Much older. He waved at me to stay away.
Jesus Christ. Where was this?
Not saying. Some things should stay lost.
humor,rookie,mistake
HAHAHA just saw the funniest shit %location%.
Spill it, I need a laugh
Rookie tried to throw a bolt at an anomaly. Threw his whole fucking detector instead ??
NO WAY! What did he do next?
Detector got fried, and now he's throwing actual roubles to check for anomalies HAHAHAH
Not gonna help him?
Ehh he made his choices
horror,underground,story
Don't go into Pripyat. Just... don't.
Why? What happened %other_first_name%?
I don't want to talk about it.
Vodka on me brat, meet me at %location%.
I'll take you up on that.
humor,fight,bar
%other_first_name% you missed the best bar fight ever last night!
Ah fuck, what happened?
Some asshole said beer was better than vodka. Whole place erupted!
xD Who won?
The barkeep. Shot his shotty into the ceiling. Everyone bought him drinks after that!
mutants,observation,scientific
Been observing the local bloodsucker pack. They're getting smarter.
Smarter how? They already hunt in packs
They're using decoys now. One shows itself, others flank. Lost two rookies to this tactic yesterday.
Fuck me. Evolution in action?
Whatever it is, spread the word. Traditional bloodsucker tactics won't work anymore.
trading,gossip,economy
Sidorovich is ripping people off worse than usual
When isn't that fat fuck scamming stalkers?
No I mean REALLY bad. 1K rubles for fucking bread blyat
Highway robbery! What's his excuse this time?
"Supply chain issues" he says. More like greed chain issues.
ghost,story,supernatural
I saw him again. The stalker with no face.
Not this shit again %speaker1_first_name%. You need to lay off the vodka
I'm serious! He was at the old checkpoint, just standing there. Where his face should be was just... smooth.
Maybe it was a guy in a mask?
He walked through the fucking wall when I approached. THROUGH it.
equipment,failure,frustration
FUCK FUCK FUCK my suit just failed in the worst possible moment!
What happened? You okay?
Servo in the leg locked up mid-sprint from a pack of dogs. Faceplanted hard.
Shit, did they get you?
Nah, managed to unlock it and hobble to safety. But I need a new suit ASAP.
stash,mystery,creepy
Found the weirdest stash today. Just... photos. Hundreds of photos.
Photos of what?
Sleeping stalkers. All different ones. Some I recognize, some are probably dead now.
That's fucking creepy. Burn that shit.
Already did. But now I can't sleep without checking my surroundings every few minutes.
faction,politics,argument
Your %other_faction% leadership is a fucking joke.
Rich coming from %speaker1_faction% dogs who can't even hold their own territory.
At least we don't kiss military ass for table scraps.
Keep talking shit and see what happens.
Is that a threat? Because I'm ready whenever you are.
%location%, tomorrow at dawn. Come alone.
emission,survival,story
Almost didn't make it through that last emission
Where were you when it hit?
Middle of fucking nowhere. Had to hide under a rusted car chassis
Jesus, that's not proper shelter!
Tell me about it. My hair's falling out and I can taste metal. But I'm alive.
scavenging,loot,friendly
%other_first_name%, you won't believe what I found in that old lab
Scientific samples? Documents?
Better. Unopened pre-war chocolate. Like 20 bars!
No way! That stuff's worth its weight in artifacts!
Already sold half to some mercs. Keeping the rest for special occasions.
paranormal,mystery,fear
During my last trip to Red Forest i saw trees bleeding.
What do you mean bleeding?
Red liquid seeping from the bark. Smells like iron. The ground underneath was all black.
That's... that's not possible
I don't know anymore what's possible or not.
advice,veteran,teaching
Rookie asking how to spot a controller before it spots you. Anyone?
Your nose bleeds first. Then the headache starts.
Fucking hell...
And NEVER look directly at it. Peripheral vision only.
Thanks. This might save my life one day.
dreams,zone,psychological
Anyone else having the dreams?
What dreams?
The ones where the Zone is calling you deeper. Showing you things.
Shit... What kind of things? I've...been having similar dreams.
A golden rusty door... And a voice saying "come home"
What the fuck...This can't be coincidence. Something's happening.
What do you mean?
Rusty golden door?! Were you able to open it?? I couldn't.
The harder i tried to open it the quieter the voice i got.
Maybe it's time to think of an exit plan off the zone. It has to be a sign.
combat,survival,intense
Held off 20 monolith at the bridge yesterday. Down to my last mag.
Bullshit. 20 monolith and you're still breathing?
Had high ground and they had to funnel through. Plus one of them dropped a RPG.
Holy shit. How many did you take down?
Lost count after 12. Bridge is littered with bodies. Good salvage if anyone's brave enough.
humor,dark,friendly
What's the difference between a rookie and an anomaly?
Oh god, another one of your shit jokes?
The anomaly might actually kill you quickly! HAHAHA
That's terrible. Tell me another one.
Why don't bloodsuckers attack %other_faction%? Professional courtesy! ??
mystery,stalker,legend
The Ghost of Pripyat saved my ass today
That's just a legend man
Tell that to the sniper who had me dead to rights. One second I'm about to die, next second the sniper's down
Could've been anyone
Nobody else around for miles. And I found a chess piece where the shot came from. A white king.
mutant,humor,unusual
So I maybe sort of have a pet pseudodog now
WHAT THE FUCK %speaker1_first_name%
It was injured! I fed it some sausage and now it follows me around
That thing will eat your face the moment you run out of food
Nah he's chill. Already warned me about two ambushes. I call him Sausage.
technology,malfunction,zone
All electronics %location% just died simultaneously
EMP anomaly?
No, weirder. They're working again but everything's displaying backwards. Text, numbers, everything.
The Zone's getting more aggressive with its mindfucks
Had to use a mirror to read my PDA. This place gets stranger every day.
humor,hazing,rookies
We sent the new guy to find a "left-handed screwdriver" HAHAHAH
Classic! How long's he been looking?
2 hours! He's been to every trader in the area!
Wait till he figures it out. I remember when we did to you!
Fuck you, I was young and stupid! hahaha
philosophy,zone,deep
You ever think the Zone is alive? Like, actually conscious?
Pass the joint, %speaker1_first_name%. You're too high.
No seriously. It reacts to us, changes based on our actions. Tests us.
...shit. When you put it that way.
What if we're just cells in its body? Or thoughts in its mind?
Okay now you definitely need to share whatever you're smoking
supplies,ambush,combat
Supply run was a fucking trap. Lost half the shipment.
Bandits?
Worse. Mercs with insider info. Someone sold us out.
Any idea who?
Got my suspicions. When I find out, they're gonna wish the Zone took them instead.
artifacts,science,discovery
Holy shit, I think I figured out how to combine artifacts!
Bullshit. Scientists have been trying that for years.
Not combining exactly. But if you expose a Moonlight to a Flash during an emission...
You get radiation poisoning and die?
You get something new. Something that shouldn't exist. I'm calling it a Flashlight ??
memories,veteran,nostalgia
Been in the Zone for 15 years now. Sometimes I forget what the outside looks like.
Why don't you leave then, old timer?
Leave? This place is in my blood now. Tried once. Lasted two weeks.
What brought you back?
The silence outside. No anomalies humming, no Geiger clicking. Felt... wrong. Dead.
The Zone ruins us all in the end, doesn't it?
emergency,warning,urgent
EMERGENCY: Unknown hostile force moving through %location%. All units avoid!
What kind of force? Military? Monolith?
Neither. They're... I don't understand, moving in perfect sync. No radio chatter. No visible patches. Couldn't get a good enough look.
How many?
Keep distance and keep tracking, report back in an hour.
drunk,philosophy,humor
bros.... what if.. what if anomalies are just the zone's farts?
How fucking drunk are you right now?
no no hear me out... gravitational anomaly = burp... flame = spicy fart...
I'm cutting you off. No more vodka.
WHIRLIGIG IS WHEN THE ZONE SPINS AFTER DRINKING TOO MUCH
hunting,bloodsucker,professional
Taking contracts for bloodsucker removal. 20k per head.
That's steep. Why so much?
Because I actually deliver. 47 confirmed kills. I know their patterns.
Prove it.
Check my PDA profile. Every kill documented. I don't fuck around.
romance,relationship,personal
She said yes!
Who said yes to what?
That trader's daughter in Skadovsk. Asked her to leave the Zone with me!
You're leaving? After all these years?
Time to try normal life. If I survive the next month saving up.
sleep,zone,serious
Anyone else barely sleep out here? Feels like the Zone hums at night.
Yeah. It's like something's always watching. Even when it’s dead quiet.
I hear footsteps sometimes. No one there when I check.
Maybe the Zone doesn’t sleep. And it doesn’t like it when you do either.
* passes blunt *
haha yeah, that probably would help you sleep brat!
monolith,defector,serious
Ex-Monolith here. The voices stopped. I need help.
How do we know you're not still brainwashed?
Because I remember my name... i think. My real name! And what I did... God, what I did...
What did you do? Talk.
I don't even know where to...We rounded up stalkers... for "cleansing." The Monolith made us do things to them while still alive. Their screams... fed the device. Amplified the Zone’s whispers.
Bullshit. But continue...
Living batteries. The Scorcher fries minds, but bodies... they twitch for days. We wired them into the machine. The agony... it powers the Monolith’s signal. Turns pain into control.
Christ... And the voices? How’d you break free?
I...don't remember...I did something but i don't remember what, my mind's foggy
No one can help you, all you can do is create a new identity like you have. Start fresh...Welcome Back STALKER
scam,warning,trading
WARNING: %other_first_name%, Petrovsky is selling fake artifacts!
That bastard! He got me last week!
Same. "Moonlight" turned out to be a painted rock
Someone should teach him a lesson
Already on it. Swap to private channel.
weather,anomaly,strange
It was raining upwards last time i was in Red Forest. UPWARDS.
What the fuck do you mean upwards?
Water falling from clouds and then levitating while ground water went upwards into the mass. Puddles in the sky.
Zone physics.
It truly was a sight though.
family,personal,emotional
Just got a message. I'm a father. Baby girl.
Holy shit! Congratulations brother!
Thanks. Need to make one more big score and get out. She deserves a real father.
What's her name?
Svetlana. After her grandmother. I'm coming home, little light.
conspiracy,theory,paranoid
I've connected the dots. The Zone isn't expanding randomly.
Here we go again with your theories...
Listen! It's following ley lines! Ancient energy paths!
You've been hitting the freedom weed again haven't you
Mock me all you want. When the Zone reaches Moscow following the dragon line, remember I called it!
Just put the ammo in the bag brat.
mercenary,job,professional
Professional squad looking for experienced Stalkers. Excellent pay.
How excellent we talking?
500k for two weeks work. Plus bonuses for objectives.
That's suicide mission money. What's the catch?
Chernobyl NPP. In and out. Simple retrieval. Interested?
Private Channel me the details.
rookie,panic,help
HELP!! TRAPPED IN BUILDING!! THINGS OUTSIDE!! HELP!!
Calm down rookie. Where are you? What things?
I DONT KNOW!! INVISIBLE BUT I HEAR BREATHING!! CLAWS ON WALLS!!
Bloodsuckers. Stay quiet. Do NOT run. Where exactly are you?
I got lost running somewhere near %location%!! Please hurry! Down to last mag!!
science,discovery,breakthrough
Fellow stalkers, the Scientists have made a major breakthrough! Anomalies have a harmonic frequency!
English please and since when are you nerd?
One of the reasons I came to the zone was to study it's anomalies and artifacts, fascinastes me.
So what was the breakthrough?
Each anomaly type vibrates at specific frequencies. With the right equipment, we can detect them from distance and potentially even manipulate them!
So... better than throwing bolts?
Yes but for a moment think bigger! It could revolutionize Science as we know it! If you can manipulate anomalies...you're basically a god. Omnipower.
I don't think it will be used for the benefit of humanity.
Everything has pros and cons. I guess as long as it doesn't fall in the wrong hands we'll be okay.
There are no "good hands".
mystery,abandoned,creepy
Found a town that's not on any map. Completely intact but empty.
Empty how? Bodies? Signs of struggle?
Nothing. Food still on tables. Cars with keys in ignition. Like everyone vanished instantly.
Get out of there. Now.
Why? Found good loot and... wait. The church bell is ringing but no one's there to ring it...
RUN YOU IDIOT!
trading,drama,conflict
That new trader %location% is a total dick
What'd he do?
Sold me "armor-piercing" rounds. They're fucking blanks painted black!
LMAO you fell for the oldest trick in the book
anomaly,research,scientific
Need volunteers to test new anomaly theory. Paying well.
Last time someone "tested theories" three stalkers melted
This is different! Just need someone to wear this modified suit near a Vortex
How much we talking?
100k for 10 minutes of data collection. Suit is 99% safe!
That 1% is why you're paying 100k isn't it?
story,campfire,legend
My grandfather told me the Zone existed before Chernobyl
Bullshit. Everyone knows it started with the disaster
No, he said there were always strange spots. Places where physics broke. Chernobyl just made it visible.
Your grandpa was a drunk potato farmer
Shut the fuck up.
equipment,review,advice
PSA: That new "Eclipse" suit is garbage. Don't waste your money.
What's wrong with it? Specs looked good
Tears like paper. Psy-protection is nonexistent. Weight distribution is fucked.
Damn, already got a mechanic to custom fit one
Cancel it. Get a used SEVA instead. Uglier but won't get you killed.
wildlife,mutants,observation
Saw something beautiful today. A herd of glowing deer.
Glowing? You mean irradiated?
No, actually glowing. Soft blue light. They weren't aggressive, just... peaceful.
The Zone showing its other face
Made me remember why I came here. Not everything has to be horror and profit.
feud,conflict,personal
If I see %other_first_name% again, he's dead. DEAD.
Whoa you're alive?? what did i do?
YOU LEFT ME FOR DEAD. Took my artifacts and ran when the bloodsuckers came.
I called for you and you didn't answer! I legged it like any reasoning person would.
Where are you??
Uhhh not gonna tell you that
The zone is a small place to hide.
routine,daily,casual
nothing like Zone coffee to start the day. tastes like motor oil but keeps you sharp
You guys have coffee? Living luxury over there
"coffee" - it's burnt grain and chicory root. maybe some actual coffee from 2008
Still better than energy drinks. Those make your piss glow
everything makes your piss glow here, friend. that's how you know you're alive
mutants,tactics,warning
UPDATE: Snorks are hunting in coordinated packs now. Just saw 8 moving in formation.
Formation? Those things can barely think
Tell that to the enemy patrol they ambushed. Flanking maneuvers and everything.
This is bad. Really bad.
Zone's teaching them. Or something is. Either way, watch your six.
artifacts,addiction,warning
Don't use Soul artifacts for more than a week straight. Trust me.
Why? Side effects?
Addiction. Your body stops healing naturally. Need the artifact just to feel normal.
Shit, I've been wearing mine for two weeks...
Wean off slowly. Cold turkey almost killed me. Felt like my bones were breaking.
horror,night,psychological
Anyone else having the dreams? The ones with the door?
Black door? Red handle? Yeah.
Fuck. It's spreading. In mine, something's knocking from the other side.
Don't open it. Whatever you do, don't open it in the dream.
Why? What happens?
Kozlov opened it. He hasn't slept in six days. Says "they" are waiting for him to close his eyes.
lucky,find,treasure
JACKPOT! Found an untouched military cache!
Bullshit. All the good stuff's been picked clean
Hidden under a collapsed tunnel. 200 rounds of AP, NVGs, and THREE exoskeletons!
Holy shit! Need help moving it?
Already moved. But I'll sell you an exo for 80k. Friends discount.
mutants,evolution,scientific
The mutants are changing. Not just behavior - physically evolving.
Examples?
Bloodsuckers with thicker skin. Snorks with longer limbs. Saw a boar with what looked like armor plating.
Natural selection on fast-forward
It's accelerating. What took decades before is happening in months now.
trading,review,recommendation
New trader %location% is legit. Fair prices, quality gear.
What's the catch? There's always a catch.
No catch. Ex-military quartermaster. Knows his shit and doesn't gouge.
Does he have medical supplies?
Full stock. Even has those military stimpaks. Expensive but worth it.
weather,warning,advisory
Potential psi-storm forming over Red Forest. All stalkers heading there, AVOID.
How bad are we talking?
Category 5. Will fry your brain through any protection less than a full psi-helm.
Shit, my squad's right in the path!
Let's hope they spot the signs.
legend,mystery,story
They say if you see your own grave in the Zone, you have 3 days to leave or it comes true
Superstitious bullshit
Markov saw his. Laughed it off. Found him three days later exactly where the grave showed.
Coincidence.
Maybe. But if you see a headstone with your name, maybe don't test it?
tech,help,equipment
Anyone know how to fix a fried PDA mainboard?
Fried how? EMP? Water? Vodka?
Electro anomaly. Screen works but no GPS or comms.
Try replacing the RF module. Usually first thing to blow.
Where the hell do I find RF modules in the Zone?
Old radio station has boxes of them. Or cannibalize a dead stalker's PDA.
final,goodbye,emotional
This is it boys. Making my run for the Wish Granter.
For real? Don't actually do it man. It's not worth it.
Been here 8 years. Lost everything outside. This is all I have left.
Fuck...What will you wish for?
To forget. To forget all of this. To forget her. See you on the other side, stalkers.
Don't do it %other_first_name%.
I...have to. I can't anymore. About to lose connection. Good bye Stalkers.
Crazy fucker...
equipment,maintenance,coordination
%other_first_name%, you got a minute? Need help with this rifle scope.
Sure thing. What's the problem?
Keeps drifting to the left. Already tried adjusting the windage.
Could be the mount. Check if the screws are tight on the rail.
Good call... yep, found two loose ones. How'd you know?
Same thing happened to me last month. Almost missed a perfect shot.
Thanks man, mind if I come over, got some other gear needs looking over?
Yeah sure, meet me at the bar later on.
supplies,planning,logistics
%other_last_name%, we need to talk about next week's supply run.
What's the situation? Running low on something specific?
Ammo's getting critical. Medical supplies too. Bandages especially.
I can handle the medical stuff. Know a guy who sells quality bandages cheap.
What about ammunition? 5.45 specifically, we're down to maybe 200 rounds.
Shit, that's low. I'll check with our usual contacts, see who's got stock.
Also need food. Canned goods, tourist's delight, anything with long shelf life.
Got it. What's the budget looking like for all this?
About 50k rubles total. Can stretch to 60k if we find good deals.
Alright, I'll send some texts. Should have a list of suppliers by tomorrow.
patrol,report,zone,atmosphere
HQ, this is Spartan One. Sector 7 sweep complete.
Read you, Spartan One. Anything worth flagging?
No contact, but spotted flesh tracks near the pipeline ruins.
Estimated pack size?
Four to five. Tracks are maybe half a shift old. Headed northbound.
North puts them near the old depot. Probably chasing rats.
Could be. No sign they’re circling toward us.
Understood. What's your current position?
Approaching northern perimeter. Should wrap and be back to HQ in 2-3 hours.
Keep sharp. HQ out.
mystery,zone,rumors
%other_first_name%, you hear about that squad that vanished near the old grain silo?
Yeah. No bodies, no gear, just... gone. Like the Zone swallowed them whole.
One guy who passed through there swears he heard voices calling his name. Said it wasn’t human.
Place was always off. Compass spins like crazy, GPS won't lock. Even the dogs won’t go near it.
Someone suggested it's a micro-emission zone. Traps you in time loops or something worse.
Or maybe something new. Something the eggheads haven’t classified yet. A living anomaly, maybe.
I’d believe it. Zone’s changing. Places shifting. Maps don’t line up like they used to.
Some of the old-timers say the Zone is waking up. That it’s watching us now.
Sounds like vodka-fueled paranoia... but I’ve seen enough weird shit to not rule it out.
Same. Best we stay the hell away from that silo. Whatever’s there... it ain’t worth the loot.
trading,equipment,friendly
%other_first_name%, still looking for that upgraded detector?
Hell yes! You found one?
Managed to get my hands on a Bear detector. Slightly used but fully functional.
Nice! What are you looking for in exchange?
Still need that night vision scope you mentioned last week.
The PSO-1? Yeah, I can part with it for another 5k on top. Fair trade?
More than fair. When do you want to make the swap?
How about tomorrow evening? I'll be back from patrol around 1800 hours.
Perfect. I'll have the scope cleaned and ready. Thanks for thinking of me.
No problem, we look out for each other. See you tomorrow, brat.
scavenging,planning,stalker_team
Yo %other_last_name%, you still up for hitting that old factory tomorrow?
Yeah, I'm in. What's the plan, and who's tagging along?
Me, you, Petrov, and that new kid who just came from the Garbage. Quiet crew.
The rookie? Hope he doesn't freeze up if things get weird.
He’ll be fine. It’s just a parts run. Some busted terminals and maybe a few old batteries.
Alright. Long as we don’t run into anything with more teeth than sense.
Few blind dogs, maybe a spark or two. Nothing major. We'll steer clear of the deeper wing.
You thinking early morning, or wait 'til the fog burns off?
Let’s move after breakfast. Should be back at the camp before dusk if all goes smooth.
Cool. I’ll sort my pack tonight, make sure the rookie ain’t bringing junk gear.
personal,friendly,wellbeing
%other_first_name%, you doing alright? Haven't seen you around much lately.
Yeah, just been pulling extra jobs. Trying to save up some rubles.
Saving for anything specific or just building reserves?
Thinking about upgrading my armor. This old jacket's seen better days.
Good call. What are you looking at? SEVA suit?
Haha not quite there yet! Something more affordable.
resources,management,practical
%other_last_name%, we need to discuss fuel allocation for the generators.
How much do we have left? Last I checked we were running pretty low.
About three days worth at current consumption rate. Maybe four if we conserve.
Shit. Any ideas on where to get more? Our usual supplier's been unreliable.
There's an abandoned gas station about 4 clicks east. Might still have some reserves.
Worth checking out, we'll head there tomorrow.
equipment,review,advice
%other_first_name%, tried that new rifle you recommended. Impressive accuracy.
Told you so! The L85 might look weird but it shoots straight.
Only complaint is the weight. Thing's heavy as hell compared to my AK.
Yeah, that's the trade-off. Better accuracy but more weight to carry around.
Worth it though. Nailed three dogs at 200 meters without breaking a sweat.
Nice shooting! How's the ammo situation? 5.56 can be pricey.
Yeah, about twice what I pay for 5.45. But quality over quantity, right?
Exactly. Better to have fewer rounds that count than spray and pray.
Any other gear recommendations? Always looking to upgrade.
Check out the new tactical vests from that trader. Good protection, reasonable price.
dreams,zone,strange
%other_last_name%, you ever have those weird-ass dreams out here?
Every other night. Last one, I was walking through Rostok, but everything was upside down.
Huh. I had one where the sky was bleeding and dogs spoke in human voices. Woke up sweating.
The Zone gets in your head, man. Too many emissions, too many nights under the open sky.
Think it's just stress? Or is it something else... like it's showing us things?
I don’t know. But I’ve heard guys say they dream about places they’ve never seen—then find them later.
That happen to you?
Once. Had a dream about a flooded tunnel with glowing moss. Found it last week west of Agroprom. But who the fuck knows, could be just Deja vu.
That’s messed up. Maybe the Zone’s not just mutating us—it’s rewiring us too.
Heh. Wouldn’t be the weirdest thing it’s done. Just wish the dreams didn’t feel so damn real.
rumor,stranger,zone
Did you see that guy that came through camp last week? Long coat, didn’t say a word?
Yeah. Looked like he walked straight out of a storm. Gear was soaked, eyes hollow.
Someone said he was seen coming from near the Brain Scorcher. Alone!.
No way he made it out of there solo. That whole sector fries your head if you get too close.
That's what I thought. But he had no burns, no rads. Like the Zone just let him pass.
He didn’t even trade. Just sat by the fire, stared into it like it was showing him something.
Did you notice the dogs wouldn’t go near him?
I did. Even Vaska's mutt, and that thing barks at anomalies.
Zone's full of ghosts, man. Maybe this one just learned how to walk among the living.
missing,stalker,zone_danger
You hear anything from Misha? He went out two days ago, said he'd be back by nightfall.
Nothing. Last ping I got was near the burnt farmstead. Then silence.
Shit. That area’s crawling with anomalies lately. He might’ve slipped into one.
Or worse. Some loners spotted bloodsucker tracks not far from there.
Always told him going solo was a gamble. Zone doesn’t give second chances.
Still, he knew the area. Wouldn't just vanish without a fight.
You want to go look for him?
Thinking about it. At least check the spot where the signal cut.
Alright. I’ll tag along. But if we find his gear and not him… we leave it at that.
Deal. No hero shit. Just closure.
weapon,malfunction,combat
You ever have your rifle jam right when things go bad?
Yesterday. Wild dogs rushed me near the embankment — damn bolt got stuck halfway.
What’d you do?
Switched to the pistol. Emptied the whole mag just to get breathing room.
I keep telling you — stop using that rusted-out AK from the flea market. It’s held together with tape and prayers.
Hey, it was cheap. And it *usually* works.
“Usually” doesn’t cut it out here. Get yourself a backup that doesn’t jam when you sneeze.
Yeah, yeah. Soon as I sell this artifact I’ve been hauling around.
Just don’t die holding junk. Ain’t worth the rubles.
stash,greed,missing
You hear what happened to Lobanov?
Yeah. Word is he found a military stash north of the swamp checkpoint. Then vanished.
Typical. Gets lucky once and suddenly he’s too good to share it with the rest of us.
Or someone followed him. Could’ve been bandits — stash like that doesn’t stay quiet long.
He should’ve kept his mouth shut. Was bragging about it over vodka like a rookie.
Now his radio's dead and no one's seen him for two days. Either he bailed... or he’s dead in a ditch.
Another zone mystery.
